<js>
//获取最新章节链接
chapter=java.get('chapter');

//获取最新章节id
idnew=chapter.match(/(\d+)\.html/)[1];
//获取第一章id
id1=java.getString('@@tag.dd.0@tag.a@href',false).match(/(\d+)\.html/)[1];
//id相减获取页数
page=Math.ceil((idnew-id1)/100);

list=[];

//获取最新12章
list1=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.get('list')).select('a').toArray();

//循环加载下一页，拼接章节列表
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
html=java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/\d+\/$/,i+'/'));
dd=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('dd a').toArray();
list.push.apply(list,dd)
}

//删除最后8章（剃除错误的章节链接）
list.splice(-8,8);

//拼接最新12章
list=list.concat(list1);

//排序
list.sort().map(x=>x)
</js>

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

murl = /"RawUrl":"([^"]+)/g;
while ((match = murl.exec(result)) != null) {
listurl.push(String(match[1]).replace(/\\/g,''))};

murl = /site_chapter_url":"([^"]+)/g;
while ((match = murl.exec(result)) != null) {
listurl.push(String(match[1]).replace(/\\/g,''))};

murl = /"u":"([^"]+)/g;
while ((match = murl.exec(result)) != null) {
listurl.push(String(match[1]).replace(/\\/g,''))};

var allurl = listurl.toString();

listurl1[i];
java.put('key',listurl1[i])
</js>
<js>if(result.match(/zongheng/)){'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/chapter/list?h5=1&pageNum=1&pageSize=99999&chapterId=&asc=0&bookId=' + result.match(/bookid=(\d+)/)[1]}

else if
(result.match(/lemonyd/)){'https://biz.lemonyd.com/book/chapter/book/'+result.match(/bid=(\d+)/)[1]+'?volumeIndex=0'}

else if
(result.match(/babk.net/)){result.replace('babk','kknn')}

else if
(result.match(/55xs.com/)){'http://www.55shuba.com/du'+result.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]+'/'}

else if
(result.match(/m.1kanshu.cc/)){var id=result.match(/(\d+)\/$/,'')[1];
xid=Math.floor(id/1000);
'https://m.1kanshu.cc/'+xid+'/'+id+'/'}

else if
(result.match(/www.anzhixiao.com/)){var id=result.match(/(\d+).html$/,'')[1];
xid=Math.floor(id/1000);
'http://www.anzhixiao.com/'+xid+'/'+id+'/'}

else if
(result.match(/www.kanxia.org/)){var id=result.match(/(\d+).html$/,'')[1];
xid=Math.floor(id/1000);
'http://www.kanxia.org/kan/'+xid+'/'+id+'/'}

else if
(result.match(/m.bqg5.cc/)){var id=result.match(/(\d+)\/$/,'')[1];
xid=Math.floor(id/1000);
'https://m.bqg5.cc/'+xid+'/'+id+'_1/'}

else if
(result.match(/www.guxs.net/)){var name=result.match(/(.*)(\d+).html$/,'')[1];
var id=result.match(/(.*)(\d+).html$/,'')[2];
xid=Math.floor(id/1000);
name+xid+'/'+id+'/'}

else if
(result.match(/www.13xs.com/)){result.replace(/(\d+).html$/,'')}

else if
(result.match(/m.aishu5.com/)){result.replace(/(\d+)\/$/,'wapbook-'+$0)}

else if
(result.match(/www.biqukan.com/)){result.replace(/http:/,'https:')}

else if
(result.match(/m.heiyan.la/)){result+'1/'}

else if
(result.match(/wap.jjwxc.net/)){result+'?more=0&whole=1'}

else if
(result.match(/wap.read8.net|m.wxguan.com/)){result+'all.html'}

else if
(result.match(/m.mubige.com/)){result+'page-1.html'}

else if
(result.match(/m.qktsw.com/)){result.replace('/tingshu','/book').replace('.html','/')}

else if
(result.match(/m.lingyu.org/)){result.replace('/wjsw','/0').replace('.html','/')}

else if
(result.match(/m.qingdou.net|m.360wxw.com/)){result.replace(/(xs|book)\//,'').replace('.html','/')}

else if
(result.match(/m.yshuoba.com/)){result.replace('m.y','www.y').replace('xtxs','ml').replace('.html','/')}

else if
(result.match(/m.ahzww.net/)){result.replace('book','0')}

else if
(result.match(/lanmaoco.com/)){result.replace(/_\d+.html$/,'')}

else if
(result.match(/m.danteng123.com/)){result.replace('book/','').replace('.html','')}

else if
(result.match(/www.wenxuem.com/)){result.replace('/info','').replace('.html','')}

else if
(result.match(/m.bichi.me|m.lnwow.net|i.258zw.com|wap.dulaidw.com|m.9i58.com/)){result.replace('info-','wapbook-').replace(/_\d+/,'')}

else if
(result.match(/m.qb5200.co|m.44pq.cc|m.qqxs.cc|m.xs7.la/)){result.replace('book_','chapters_')}


else if
(result.match(/m.ibiquge.net/)){result.replace('_','/')}

else if
(result.match(/m.mhtwx.la|m.balingtxt.com/)){result+'page-1.html'}

else{result}</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/zongheng/)){var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
}

else if (baseUrl.match(/lemonyd/)){var bookId = baseUrl.match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .data.rf.filter(o => !o.name.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.name.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'https://biz.lemonyd.com/book/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId
   };
  });
}

else {doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result.replace(/(立即|开始)阅读(记录|)|(\[|↑)*(正|倒|顺)序(\]|↓)*|(章节|返回)(目录|主页|)|(我的|加入|)书架|(首|尾)页|玄幻(奇幻|小说|)|(现代|)都市(言情|)|(最新|)TXT下载|其他|推荐|用这款(APP|app).*?准确.|↓直达页面底部↓|上一页|查看全部/g,''));

a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({name:x.text(),
url:x.attr('href')}));

if(baseUrl.match(/m.yqxs.cc||ciluzww.com||ttshuba.com/))

}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集(，|)/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?(阅读模式！|浏览器！)/g,"")
.replace(/禁止转码.*?请退出阅读模式！/g,"").replace(/chapter_c\(\)\;/g,"")
</js>

<js>
function AES(input){
       rv = java.base64Decode(input);
       return rv;
    }
if(result.match(/function AES\(input\)\{/)){
html=result.match(/['"](.*?)['"]\s+function AES\(input\)\{/)[1];
result=AES(html)
}else{
result=java.getString("//a[@href='javascript:;']/../following-sibling::div[1]@html",false)
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:lastest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
发现：全网排行
搜索：全网搜书
原网：直达原网

搜索关键字
──────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
简化格式4(夸克官方数据)：#作者
──────
目录排序：网站章节目录错乱的小说网站质量很差，对这种网站的小说目录重新排序浪费时间不值得，故夸克原网不对目录进行排序，如果想对目录排序请使用“夸克电脑”，夸克电脑对章节进行了重新排序
──────
注意事项：
①关键字前加“$”可启动动态加载，当内容为空时有奇效
②关键字前加“-”可让目录列表逆向排序，既逆向排序又动态加载时，前缀为“-$”
③关键字前加“@”将允许详情页自动跳转，如“@超神机械师$www.biquge.info”，目录中仅有“内容浏览”这个项目时，加“@”前缀有奇效。
既允许详情页自动跳转，又设置目录逆向排序、设置正文动态加载，则前缀为“@-$”

//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")

.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母

.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集(，|)/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?(阅读模式！|浏览器！)/g,"")
.replace(/禁止转码.*?请退出阅读模式！/g,"").replace(/chapter_c\(\)\;/g,"")
</js>

ruleSearch.author: @JSon:$.authorname||$.authorName
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items.slice(0,10);}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

//返回json字符串
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]
